title: Wireless RF Compliance Validation (Sr. Technician)
summary: At Apple, we work every single day to craft products that enrich people’s lives. Do you love working on challenges that no one has solved yet? Do you like changing the game? As a member of our dynamic group, you will have the unique and rewarding opportunity to shape upcoming products that will delight and inspire millions of Apple’s customers every day. Apple SAR Engineering team is looking for a Technician to work on RF Exposure (SAR/MPE) characterization across different wireless technologies for Apple’s wireless products
description:
- Validating RF Exposure test cases for different regulatory domains in certification test setups.
- Coordinating with engineers within SAR team to ensure product validation covers all certification tests.
- Execute validation plan for RF Exposure facing SW features
- Debugging marginal/failure tests with senior engineers within team and help drive design changes to address issues
- Maintain test setups via periodic checks, calibration, etc.
- Help Regulatory Compliance teams in planning/executing on final certification testing at 3rd party test labs.
key_qualifications:
Working experience of engineering testing, in particular hands-on experience for wireless  measurements is desirable.
Working experience with different lab equipment: network analyzers, signal generators, signal analyzers, call boxes (i.e. CMW) is desirable
Experience with different wireless communication systems such as GSM/UMTS/LTE, 802.11xx, Bluetooth etc. is desirable
Experience with regulatory requirements and certification process for wireless consumer devices, including FCC, ETSI, 3GPP etc. is a plus.
Excellent communication skills required, both written & verbal
Experience with 5GmmWave standard and/or hands-on chamber/system level understanding is a plus.
education_experience: BS degree or Associate Degree + 2 years of job experience
